<script src="https://www.gstatic.com/firebasejs/8.6.8/firebase-app.js"></script>
<script src="https://www.gstatic.com/firebasejs/8.6.8/firebase-messaging.js"></script>
<script>
var bellNotification = new Vue({
    el: "#bell-container",
    data () {
        return {
            logedin: false,
            loading: false,
            messaging: {},
            isActive: true,
            showTooltip: false,
            permission: '',
            token: '',
            browserSupport: true,
            isOpera: false,
            isEdge: false,
            isChrome: false,
            isExplorer: false,
            isFirefox: false,
            isSafari: false,
        };
    },
    methods: {
        detectBrowser() {
            this.isOpera = !!window.opera || navigator.userAgent.indexOf(' OPR/') >= 0;
            this.isEdge = navigator.userAgent.indexOf("Edge") > -1;
            this.isChrome = !!window.chrome && !this.isOpera && !this.isEdge;
            this.isExplorer= typeof document !== 'undefined' && !!document.documentMode && !this.isEdge;
            this.isFirefox = typeof window.InstallTrigger !== 'undefined';
            this.isSafari = /^((?!chrome|android).)*safari/i.test(navigator.userAgent);
        },

        getBrowserInfo(){
            var ua=navigator.userAgent,tem,M=ua.match(/(opera|chrome|safari|firefox|msie|trident(?=\/))\/?\s*(\d+)/i) || [];
            if(/trident/i.test(M[1])){
                tem=/\brv[ :]+(\d+)/g.exec(ua) || [];
                return {name:'IE ',version:(tem[1]||'')};
                }
            if(M[1]==='Chrome'){
                tem=ua.match(/\bOPR\/(\d+)/)
                if(tem!=null)   {return {name:'Opera', version:tem[1]};}
                }
            M=M[2]? [M[1], M[2]]: [navigator.appName, navigator.appVersion, '-?'];
            if((tem=ua.match(/version\/(\d+)/i))!=null) {M.splice(1,1,tem[1]);}
            return {
              name: M[0],
              version: M[1]
            };
        },
        toggleTooltip () {
            this.showTooltip = !this.showTooltip;
            if (this.showTooltip) {
                this.$nextTick(function () {
                    if ($('#noti-guide-image').length > 0 && $('#noti-guide-image').attr('bind-src')) {
                        $('#noti-guide-image').attr('src', $('#noti-guide-image').attr('bind-src'));
                        $('#noti-guide-image').removeAttr('bind-src');
                    }
                });
            }
        },

        stopPropagation(event) {
            event.stopPropagation()
        },

        async updateDeviceStatus(status) {
            this.loading = true;
            try {
                let currentToken = await this.messaging.getToken();
                let result = await $.ajax({
                    url: 'https://www.topcv.vn/notification/update-device-status',
                    type: 'POST',
                    dataType: 'json',
                    data: {
                        status: status,
                        token: currentToken
                    },
                })
                this.isActive = result.active;
            } catch (err) {
                throw err;
            }
            this.loading = false;
        },

        getPermission() {
            if (!("Notification" in window)) {
                console.log("This browser does not support system notifications");
                this.browserSupport = false;
            } else {
                this.permission = Notification.permission;
            }
        },

        setCookie(name,value,days) {
            var expires = "";
            if (days) {
                var date = new Date();
                date.setTime(date.getTime() + (days*24*60*60*1000));
                expires = "; expires=" + date.toUTCString();
            }
            document.cookie = name + "=" + (value || "")  + expires + "; path=/";
        },

        getCookie(name) {
            var nameEQ = name + "=";
            var ca = document.cookie.split(';');
            for (var i=0; i < ca.length; i++) {
                var c = ca[i];
                while (c.charAt(0)==' ') c = c.substring(1,c.length);
                if (c.indexOf(nameEQ) == 0) return c.substring(nameEQ.length,c.length);
            }
            return null;
        },

        eraseCookie(name) {
            document.cookie = name+'=; Max-Age=-99999999;';
        },

        allowNoti() {
            this.requestPermission();
            this.hidePopover();
        },

        cancelNoti() {
            this.hidePopover();
            this.setCookie('not_show_noti', true, 7);
        },

        showPopover() {
            if (this.isSafari) {
                return ;
            }
            if (this.permission == 'default' && this.logedin) {
                if (!this.getCookie('not_show_noti')) {
                    $("#topcv-popover-container").addClass('slide-down');
                }
            }
        },

        hidePopover() {
            $("#topcv-popover-container").removeClass('slide-down');
        },

        requestPermission() {
            if (this.isSafari) {
                this.toggleTooltip();
                return;
            }
            if (this.permission === "granted" || this.permission === "denied" ) {
                this.toggleTooltip();
            } else {
                Notification.requestPermission((permission) => {
                    if (permission === "granted") {
                        var notification = new Notification("Cảm ơn bạn đã đăng ký nhận thông báo từ TOPCV");
                        this.attachTokenToUser()
                        this.isActive = true;
                    }
                    this.getPermission();
                    this.showTooltip = false;
                });
            }
        },

        async getDeviceStatus() {
            try {
                try {
                    let currentToken = await this.messaging.getToken();
                    if (currentToken == null) {
                        return null;
                    }
                    let result = await $.ajax({
                        url: 'https://www.topcv.vn/notification/get-device-status' + '?token=' + currentToken,
                        type: 'GET',
                        dataType: 'json',
                    })
                    this.isActive = result.active;
                } catch (err) {
                    console.log('Cant not get token');
                    return;
                }

            } catch (err) {
                throw err
            }

        },

        async attachTokenToUser() {
            try {
                let currentToken = await this.messaging.getToken();
                if (currentToken == null) {
                    return null;
                }
                this.token = currentToken;
                let device = this.getBrowserInfo()
                try {
                    let result = await $.ajax({
                        url: 'https://www.topcv.vn/notification/add-device',
                        type: 'POST',
                        dataType: 'json',
                        data: {
                            token: currentToken,
                            device_name: device.name,
                            device_version: device.version,
                            _token: '2ua3W4YJCrY4RDcXCRfnASugmiPKneLUlOftuKTb'
                        }
                    })
                } catch (err) {
                    throw err
                }
            } catch (err) {
                console.log('Can\'t get Token');
                return;
            }

        },

        isVisible() {
            var vis = (function(){
                var stateKey, eventKey, keys = {
                    hidden: "visibilitychange",
                    webkitHidden: "webkitvisibilitychange",
                    mozHidden: "mozvisibilitychange",
                    msHidden: "msvisibilitychange"
                };
                for (stateKey in keys) {
                    if (stateKey in document) {
                        eventKey = keys[stateKey];
                        break;
                    }
                }
                return function(c) {
                    if (c) document.addEventListener(eventKey, c);
                    return !document[stateKey];
                }
            })();
            return vis();
        }

    },

    created() {
        sessionStorage.setItem('is_at_least_one_tab_open', 1);
        if (navigator && navigator.serviceWorker) {
            navigator.serviceWorker.addEventListener('message', function (event) {
                // custom sk click noti firebase
                if (event.data.isFirebaseMessaging && event.data.messageType === 'notification-clicked' &&
                event.data.notification && event.data.notification.click_action && sessionStorage.getItem('is_at_least_one_tab_open')) {
                window.open(event.data.notification.click_action);
                }
            });
        }
        this.detectBrowser();
        this.getPermission();
        try {
            var firebaseConfig = {
                apiKey: "AIzaSyAxfiqmPAe7AUywT2LgpDBHsYUejJcR1l8",
                authDomain: "topcv-firebase-production.firebaseapp.com",
                databaseURL: "https://topcv-firebase-production.firebaseio.com",
                projectId: "topcv-firebase-production",
                storageBucket: "",
                messagingSenderId: "856359690731",
                appId: "1:856359690731:web:93a93cead8a22fc5"
            };
                  // Initialize Firebase
            firebase.initializeApp(firebaseConfig);

            this.messaging = firebase.messaging();
            this.messaging.usePublicVapidKey("BFYa7DSJZU85c4mtXSe_0GlwQquQTKi_8Z0CbRpDduw1zxQs6HIqefqBPd3bAhvJDN1AQR_pzlIcoswfJYP3v9I");

            this.messaging.onMessage((payload) => {
                if (this.isVisible()) {
                    var options = {
                        "image": payload.notification.image,
                        "icon": payload.notification.icon,
                        "body": payload.notification.body
                    }
                    var noti = new Notification(payload.notification.title, options);
                    noti.onclick = function() {
                        window.open(payload.notification.click_action)
                    }
                }
            });
        } catch (err) {
            console.log('browser not support FCM')
        }
    },
    beforeMount() {
        this.attachTokenToUser();
        this.getDeviceStatus();
    },
    mounted() {
        this.showPopover();
    }
})

$(window).click(function() {
    bellNotification.showTooltip = false;
});

$('#bell-container').click(function(event){
    event.stopPropagation();
});

</script>

        });

    <script src="https://www.topcv.vn/v3/plugins/slick/slick.min.js"></script>
    <script type="text/javascript">
        const isMobile = '1';
        let suggestionCourse = new Vue({
            el: '#suggestion-course',
            data () {
                return {
                    loading: false,
                    courses: [],
                }
            },
            mounted () {
                var paused = false
                if (isMobile) {
                    if (!paused) {
                        Vue.nextTick(() => {
                            suggestionCourse.getJobSuggestionCourses()
                            paused = true;
                        })
                    }
                } else {
                    $(window).scroll(function(){
                        if ($(window).scrollTop() >= 1500) {
                            if (!paused) {
                                suggestionCourse.getJobSuggestionCourses()
                                paused = true;
                            }
                        }
                    })
                }
            },
            methods: {
                getJobSuggestionCourses () {
                    this.loading = true
                    $.ajax({
                        url: 'https://www.topcv.vn/job/ajax-get-suggestion-courses',
                        type: 'GET',
                        data: {
                            job_id: '1506045'
                        },
                    })
                    .done((response) => {
                        if (response.status == 'success') {
                            this.courses = response.courses
                        }
                    })
                    .fail(() => {
                        console.log("Đã có lỗi xảy ra")
                    })
                    .always(() => {
                        this.loading = false
                    });
                },
                getSlidesToShow () {
                    let sizes = [
                        {
                            maxWidth: 992,
                            slidesToShow: 3
                        },
                        {
                            maxWidth: 768,
                            slidesToShow: 3
                        },
                        {
                            maxWidth: 576,
                            slidesToShow: 1
                        },
                    ]

                    let windowSize = screen.width;

                    for (let size of sizes) {
                        if (windowSize >= size.maxWidth) {
                            return size.slidesToShow;
                        }
                    }
                }
            },

            updated () {
                console.log(this.getSlidesToShow());
                $('.suggestion-courses').slick({
                    slidesToShow: this.getSlidesToShow(),
                    slidesToScroll: 1,
                    autoplay: true,
                    autoplaySpeed: 2000,
                });
            }
        });
    </script>

    $(".btn-close, .btn-close-turn-on-location").click(function() {
        $('#modal-turn-on-location').slideUp('fast');
        $('.backdrop-turn-on-location').css("display", "none");
    })
</script>

  $(document).ready(function() {
    $('.box-image-modal-carousel').slick({
      dots: true,
      slidesToShow: 1,
      slidesToScroll: 1,
      arrows: false,
      autoplay: true,
      autoplaySpeed: 5000

    <script>
        $(document).ready(function() {
            $('.btn-collapse-batch').on('click', function() {
                const parentElementId = $(this).attr('data-target');
                const parentElement = $(parentElementId);
                Array.from($('.btn-collapse-batch')).forEach((el) => $(el).removeClass('active'));
                if ($(this).hasClass('active')) {
                    $(this).removeClass('active');
                } else {
                    $(this).addClass('active');
                }
                Array.from($('#accordion .collapse')).forEach((el) => $(el).removeClass('in'));
                if (!$(parentElement).hasClass('in')) {
                    $(parentElement).addClass('in');
                }
            })
        });

        (() => {
            const i = setInterval(() => {
                if (!window.ta) return;
                ta.setImpressionHandler && ta.setImpressionHandler((data) => {
                    ta('Impressions', {
                        imprs: data.map(item => ({
                            b: item['box'],
                            jb_id: parseInt(item['job-id']),
                            impr_pos: item['job-position'],
                            jr_i: item['jr-id'],
                            p: "JobDetail",
                            ts: new Date().getTime(),
                            type: "JobInViewPort",
                        }))
                    });
                });
                clearInterval(i);
            }, 100);
        })();
        //         var isSave = "1";
        function showNormalBatchApply (jobId) {
            $.ajax({
                url: 'https://www.topcv.vn/smilar-batch-apply-jobs',
                type: 'GET',
                dataType: 'JSON',
                data: {id: jobId},
            })
                .done(function(response) {
                    if (response.status == 'success') {
                        if (response.jobs.length > 0) {
                            batchApply.isNormalBatchApply = true;
                            batchApply.jobs = response.jobs;
                            batchApply.coverLetter = '';
                            batchApply.isUploadFileBefore = false;
                            batchApply.usecv = 'new';
                            batchApply.isUsingOnlineCv = true;
                            batchApply.showModal();
                            window.trackingTopCV.sendTrackingShowBatchApplyModal('Sales Executive (Fluent In English-  Service Field- Income Up To 35Mil)');
                        }
                    }
                })
                .fail(function() {
                    // console.log("error");
                })
                .always(function() {
                    // console.log("complete");
                });
        }

        function showBatchApplyModal (jobId, cvApplyId = null, coverLetter = '', applyId = null, isUsingOnlineCv = true, preApplyCVUrl = null, fullname = null, email = null, phone = null, cvUploadId = null, is_user_cv_upload = false, isSaveCvUpload = false) {
            $.ajax({
                url: 'https://www.topcv.vn/smilar-batch-apply-jobs',
                type: 'GET',
                dataType: 'JSON',
                data: {
                    id: jobId,
                    ta_source: "ModalBatchApply_LinkDetail"
                },
            })
                .done(function(response) {
                    if (response.status == 'success') {
                        if (response.jobs.length > 0) {
                            batchApply.jobs = response.jobs;
                            batchApply.cvApplyId = cvApplyId;
                            batchApply.cvUploadId = cvUploadId;
                            batchApply.coverLetter = coverLetter;
                            if (!cvApplyId && !cvUploadId) {
                                batchApply.isUploadFileBefore = true;
                            } else {
                                batchApply.isUploadFileBefore = false;
                                batchApply.usecv = 'new';
                            }
                            batchApply.applyId = applyId;
                            batchApply.preApplyCVUrl = preApplyCVUrl;
                            batchApply.isUsingOnlineCv = isUsingOnlineCv;
                            batchApply.isUsingCvUploadOnline = is_user_cv_upload
                            batchApply.fullname = fullname;
                            batchApply.email = email;
                            batchApply.phone = phone
                            if (isSaveCvUpload) {
                                $.ajax({
                                    url: 'https://www.topcv.vn/ajax-get-cv-upload',
                                    type: 'GET',
                                    dataType: 'JSON',
                                })
                                    .done(function(response) {
                                        batchApply.transformedUserCvUploads = response.data
                                        batchApply.cvUploadId = response.data[response.data.length-1].id
                                        batchApply.isUsingCvUploadOnline = true
                                        isSave = response.isSave;
                                    })
                            }
                            batchApply.showModal();
                            window.trackingTopCV.sendTrackingShowBatchApplyModal('Sales Executive (Fluent In English-  Service Field- Income Up To 35Mil)');

                            // Send ta tracking job rendered
                            $jobRenderdIds = response.jobs.map(jobRendered => jobRendered.id);
                             (() => {
                                const i = setInterval(() => {
                                    if (!window.ta) return;
                                     ta('jobRendered', {
                                        renderAt: new Date().getTime(),
                                        page: 'JobDetail',
                                        box: 'ModalBatchApply',
                                        jobIds: jobRenderedIds,
                                    })
                                    clearInterval(i);
                                }, 100);
                            })();
                        } else {
                            batchApply.showApplyNoticeModal();
                        }
                    }
                })
                .fail(function() {
                    // console.log("error");
                })
                .always(function() {
                    // console.log("complete");
                });
        }


        var batchApply = new Vue({
            el: "#modal-batch-apply",
            data () {
                return {
                    isNormalBatchApply: false,
                    isCompleteBatchApply: false,
                    filerKit: null,
                    step: 1,
                    jobs:[],
                    transformedCvs: [],
                    transformedUserCvUploads: [],
                    selected_job_ids: [],
                    cvApplyId: "",
                    cvUploadId: null,
                    coverLetter: null,
                    isUsingOnlineCv: true,
                    isUsingCvUploadOnline: false,
                    fullname: null,
                    email: null,
                    phone: null,
                    preApplyCVUrl: null,
                    usecv: 'before',
                    isSubmittingBatch: false,
                    isUploadFileBefore: false,
                    isSaveBatchCvUpload: false
                };
            },

            mounted() {

            },

            updated() {
                if ($(".jFiler #filer_input_batch").length == 0) {
                    this.$nextTick(function(){
                        $('#filer_input_batch').filer({
                            limit: 1,
                            // maxSize: 3,
                            fileMaxSize: 5,
                            extensions: ["doc", "pdf", "docx"],
                            showThumbs: true,
                            changeInput: `<div class="jFiler-input-dragDrop" ><div class="jFiler-input-inner"><div class="jFiler-input-icon"><i class="fa-light fa-file-lines"></i></div><div class="jFiler-input-text"><h3 class="text-premium" style="font-size: 14px">Tải lên CV tệp .pdf, .doc, or .docx
                            tối đa 5MB</h3></div><a class="btn btn-topcv-primary btn-sm">Chọn file</a></div></div>`,
                            theme: "dragdropbox",
                            captions: {
                                button: "Chọn file",
                                feedback: "Chọn CV để tải lên",
                                feedback2: "file đã được chọn",
                                drop: "Kéo thả CV vào đây để tải lên",
                                removeConfirmation: "Bạn chắc chắn muốn hủy CV này?",
                                errors: {
                                    filesLimit: "Bạn chỉ được upload tối đa {{fi-limit}} files.",
                                    filesType: "Bạn chỉ được upload file theo định dạng PDF, DOC hoặc DOCX.",
                                    filesSize: "Dung lượng file {{fi-name}} vượt quá mức cho phép! Bạn chỉ được tải file dung lượng tối đa {{fi-fileMaxSize}} MB.",
                                    filesSizeAll: "Tổng dung lượng file tải lên vượt quá mức cho phép! Tổng dung lượng tải lên tối đa {{fi-maxSize}} MB.",
                                    folderUpload: "Bạn không thể tải lên dạng thư mục."
                                }
                            },
                            dragDrop: {
                                dragEnter: null,
                                dragLeave: null,
                                drop: function (files) {
                                    $('input[name=cv_file_batch]')[0].files = files;
                                },
                                dragContainer: null,
                            },
                            templates: {
                                box: '<ul class="jFiler-items-list jFiler-items-default"></ul>',
                                item: '<li class="jFiler-item"><div class="jFiler-item-container"><div class="jFiler-item-inner"><div class="jFiler-item-icon pull-left"><i class="fa fa-file text-premium"></i></div><div class="jFiler-item-info pull-left"><div class="jFiler-item-title" title="{{fi-name}}">{{fi-name | limitTo:50}}</div><div class="jFiler-item-others"><span>size: {{fi-size2}}</span><span>type: {{fi-extension}}</span><span class="jFiler-item-status">{{fi-progressBar}}</span></div><div class="jFiler-item-assets"><ul class="list-inline"><li><a class="jFiler-item-trash-action text-danger"><i class="fa fa-times"></i></a></li></ul></div></div></div></div></li>',
                                itemAppend: '<li class="jFiler-item"><div class="jFiler-item-container"><div class="jFiler-item-inner"><div class="jFiler-item-icon pull-left">{{fi-icon}}</div><div class="jFiler-item-info pull-left"><div class="jFiler-item-title">@{{fi-name | limitTo:50}}</div><div class="jFiler-item-others"><span>size: {{fi-size2}}</span><span>type: {{fi-extension}}</span><span class="jFiler-item-status"></span></div><div class="jFiler-item-assets"><ul class="list-inline"><li><a class="icon-jfi-trash jFiler-item-trash-action"></a></li></ul></div></div></div></div></li>',
                                progressBar: '<div class="bar"></div>',
                                itemAppendToEnd: false,
                                removeConfirmation: true,
                                canvasImage: true,
                                _selectors: {
                                    list: '.jFiler-items-list',
                                    item: '.jFiler-item',
                                    progressBar: '.bar',
                                    remove: '.jFiler-item-trash-action'
                                },
                            },
                            // files: null,
                            addMore: false,
                            allowDuplicates: true,
                            clipBoardPaste: true,
                            onRemove: null,
                            beforeRender: function () {
                                // $('#btn-seelct-cv').prop('disabled', true);
                            },
                            onEmpty: function () {
                                $('.jFiler-input-dragDrop').show();
                            },
                            onSelect: function () {
                                $('.jFiler-input-dragDrop').hide();
                                resetSelectCvOnlineForm();
                            },
                            options: null,
                            dialogs: {
                                alert: function(text) {
                                    return showModalError(text);
                                },
                                confirm: function (text, callback) {
                                    confirmModal.showConfirm(text, 'warning', callback, null);
                                }
                            },
                        });
                    })
                }
            },

            computed: {
                selectedJobs () {
                    return this.jobs.filter((job) => {
                        return this.selected_job_ids.indexOf(job.id) >= 0
                    });
                },

                userCvs () {
                    return this.transformedCvs.filter((cv) => {
                        return !cv.is_profile;
                    })
                },
                userUserCvUpload () {
                    return this.transformedUserCvUploads
                },

                userProfile () {
                    let profiles = this.transformedCvs.filter((cv) => {
                        return cv.is_profile;
                    })
                    if (profiles.length > 0) {
                        return profiles[0];
                    }
                    return null;
                },

                selectedCv () {
                    let cvs = this.transformedCvs.filter((cv) => {
                        return cv.cv_id == this.cvApplyId;
                    })
                    if (cvs.length > 0) {
                        return cvs[0];
                    }
                    let cvUploads = this.transformedUserCvUploads.filter((cvUpload) => {
                        return cvUpload.id == this.cvUploadId;
                    })
                    if (cvUploads.length > 0) {
                        return cvUploads[0];
                    }
                    return null;
                },

                showUploadArea () {
                    return this.preApplyCVUrl == null || this.usecv == 'new'
                },

                isNewUpload () {
                    return this.usecv == 'new' && !this.isUsingOnlineCv
                },

            },

            watch: {

                jobs: function (jobs) {
                    let selected_job_ids = [];
                    jobs.forEach((job) => {
                        selected_job_ids.push(job.id);
                    })
                    this.selected_job_ids = selected_job_ids;
                },
                cvUploadId: function () {
                    if (this.cvUploadId != null) {
                        this.cvApplyId = null;
                        this.isUsingOnlineCv = false;
                        this.isUsingCvUploadOnline = true;
                    }
                },
                cvApplyId: function () {
                    if (this.cvApplyId != null) {
                        this.cvUploadId = null;
                        this.isUsingOnlineCv = true;
                        this.isUsingCvUploadOnline = false;
                    }
                },
            },

            methods: {
                showLoginForm () {
                    showLoginPopup('https://www.topcv.vn/viec-lam/sales-executive-fluent-in-english-service-field-income-up-to-35mil/1506045.html', 'Đăng nhập hoặc Đăng ký để ứng tuyển các công việc này!');
                    $("#modal-batch-apply").modal('hide');
                },

                showApplyNoticeModal() {
                    // Need update here
                    // if (this.isCompleteBatchApply) {
                    //     $('#modal-notice-apply').modal('show');
                    // } else {
                    //     $('#modal-notice-apply').modal('show');
                    // }

                    $('#modal-notice-apply').modal('show');

                },

                updateCvApplyId(cv_id) {
                    this.cvApplyId = cv_id;
                },
                editCoverLetter () {
                    this.step = 2;
                    this.$refs.coverLetter.focus()
                },

                validateStepTwo() {
                    if (!this.isUsingOnlineCv && !this.isUsingCvUploadOnline) {
                        if (this.usecv == 'new' && $('#filer_input_batch').get(0).files.length === 0) {
                            toastr.error('Bạn chưa chọn file upload')
                            return false;
                        }
                        if (!this.fullname) {
                            toastr.error('Họ tên không được để trống')
                            this.$refs.fullname.focus()
                            return false;

                        }
                        if (!this.email) {
                            toastr.error('Email không được để trống')
                            this.$refs.email.focus()
                            return false;

                        }
                        if (!this.phone) {
                            toastr.error('Số điện thoại không được để trống')
                            this.$refs.phone.focus()
                            return false;

                        }
                    } else {
                        if (!this.cvApplyId && !this.cvUploadId) {
                            toastr.error('Vui lòng chọn một CV để tiếp tục ứng tuyển')
                            return false;
                        }
                    }
                    this.step = 3;
                },

                showUploadForm() {
                    this.isUsingOnlineCv = false;
                    this.isUsingCvUploadOnline = false;
                    this.cvApplyId = null;
                    this.cvUploadId = null;
                    const formInfoCvUploads = document.querySelectorAll('.formInfoUserUpload');
                    if (formInfoCvUploads) {
                        formInfoCvUploads.forEach(el => el.style.display = 'none')
                    }
                },

                showSelectOnlineCVForm() {
                    this.isUsingOnlineCv = true;
                },

                cancelBatchApply() {
                    $("#modal-batch-apply").modal('hide');
                    if (!this.isNormalBatchApply) {
                        this.showApplyNoticeModal();
                    }
                    // console.log('Cancel batch apply')
                },

                showModal() {
                    $("#modal-batch-apply").modal({backdrop: 'static', keyboard: false});
                },

                async submitBatchApply () {

                    this.isSubmittingBatch = true;
                    let self = this;
                    try {
                        const jobsRecommendation = JSON.stringify(batchApply.jobs.filter(job => {
                            return this.selected_job_ids.includes(job.id);
                        }).map(job => {
                            return {
                                jb_id: job.id,
                                jr_i: job.job_recommendation_id
                            }
                        }));

                        let data = new FormData();
                        data.append('job_ids', this.selected_job_ids);
                        data.append('apply_id', this.applyId);
                        data.append('cv_apply_id', this.cvApplyId);
                        data.append('cv_upload_id', this.cvUploadId);
                        data.append('cover_letter', this.coverLetter);
                        data.append('is_using_online_cv', this.isUsingOnlineCv);
                        data.append('is_using_online_upload_cv', this.isUsingCvUploadOnline);
                        data.append('fullname', this.fullname);
                        data.append('email', this.email);
                        data.append('phone', this.phone);
                        data.append('is_new_upload', this.isNewUpload);
                        data.append('ta_source', "JobSearchList_LinkDetail");
                        data.append('is_save_batch_cv_upload', this.isSaveBatchCvUpload);
                        data.append('jobs_recommendation', jobsRecommendation);

                        if (this.isNewUpload) {
                            data.append('cv_file', $('#filer_input_batch')[0].files[0]);
                        }
                        let result = await $.ajax({
                            url: 'https://www.topcv.vn/ajax-submit-batch-apply-jobs',
                            data: data,
                            dataType: 'JSON',
                            type: 'POST',
                            contentType: false, // NEEDED, DON'T OMIT THIS (requires jQuery 1.6+)
                            processData: false,
                        })
                        window.trackingTopCV.sendBatchApplyEvent('Sales Executive (Fluent In English-  Service Field- Income Up To 35Mil)', this.selected_job_ids.length);
                        if (result.status == 'success') {
                            ta('BatchApplyJob', {
                                jobIds: self.selected_job_ids,
                                oth: {
                                    jr_i: JSON.stringify(batchApply.jobs.filter(job => {
                                        return self.selected_job_ids.includes(job.id);
                                    }).map(job => {
                                        return {
                                            jb_id: job.id.toString(),
                                            jr_i: job.job_recommendation_id.toString()
                                        }
                                    }))
                                }
                            });
                            self.isCompleteBatchApply = true;
                            self.showApplyNoticeModal();
                            // showModalSuccess('Bạn đã ứng tuyển thành công! Hãy chú ý kiểm tra email và điện thoại di động của bạn bởi vì có thể nhà tuyển dụng sẽ liên hệ lại với bạn trong thời gian tới.')
                            $("#modal-batch-apply").modal('hide');
                        } else {
                            showModalError(result.error);
                        }
                    } catch (err) {
                        console.log(err)
                        showModalError("Đã có lỗi xảy ra vui lòng thử lại sau, hoặc liên hệ TOPCV để được hỗ trợ");
                    }
                    this.isSubmittingBatch = false;
                },
                toggleSelectedJobs(element) {
                    if (this.selected_job_ids.length === this.jobs.length) {
                        this.selected_job_ids = [];
                    } else {
                        return this.selected_job_ids = this.jobs.map(job => job.id);
                    }
                }
            },
        })

        var cvSaveBatchCvUploadElement = document.querySelector('#cb-save-batch-cv-upload');
        $('#cb-save-batch-cv-upload').change(function () {
            if ($(this).is(':checked')) {

                if (!isSave) {
                    toastr.error('Số  lượng lưu CV Upload đã đạt giới hạn');
                    cvSaveBatchCvUpload.setPosition(1);
                } else {
                    batchApply.isSaveBatchCvUpload = true;
                }
            } else {
                batchApply.isSaveBatchCvUpload = false;
            }
        });

        $('#modal-batch-apply').on('shown.bs.modal', function () {
            (() => {
                const i = setInterval(() => {
                    if (!window.ta) return;
                    ta.checkingImpression && ta.checkingImpression();
                    clearInterval(i);
                }, 100);
            })();
        });
    </script>
